**Gel Documentation System Tender Announcement**
=============================================

| **Regions of Opportunity**                       | Canada                                                             |

### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking a request for proposal for a Gel Documentation System. The successful bidder will be selected based on the technical criteria and lowest price.

Key technical requirements include:

* UV and blue light capabilities for DNA/RNA gels
* Fluorescence detection with multiple channels (Blue, Green, Red, Far Red, and NIR)
* True-color imaging of opaque and translucent samples
* Multiplex fluorescence with 5-color channels
* Chemiluminescence and multiple Western applications
* High-resolution camera and high signal-to-noise ratio
* Automatic image focusing

The successful bidder must hold a pre-qualified status under the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI and meet the mandatory technical criteria.

**Important Notes**

* Only suppliers pre-qualified under the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI may submit a bid.
* Suppliers must be prepared to provide evidence of their pre-qualified status under the Arrangement.
* The notice is published on Buy and Sell Canada for a period of 40 calendar days.
* A solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI /C is available for download on Buyandsell.gc.ca. Interested suppliers should review the document and submit a response as
